content:
As a realtor, I am excited to present this spectacular side-by-side duplex loft condo to you. This property boasts 2 spacious bedrooms, 2 luxurious bathrooms and an open-concept layout with high ceilings and an abundance of natural light filtering through skylights in the master bedroom bathroom. The sleek and modern design is highlighted by exposed brick walls, hardwood floors, and a cozy fireplace. The gourmet kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and an island, perfect for entertaining. The bedrooms are both generously sized and feature ample closet space and natural light. The master bedroom features a spa-like en-suite bathroom with a double vanity and walk-in shower, as well as skylights that fill the space with natural light. The second bedroom shares the second full bathroom with guests. Enjoy the private outdoor space, perfect for relaxing or entertaining.

This property's location is also a major plus, situated in a highly sought-after neighborhood, close to shopping, dining, and entertainment, and just minutes away from public transportation. This condo offers the perfect blend of modern luxury and urban living.

I would be more than happy to schedule a showing for you at your convenience, and answer any questions you may have about this property or the buying process. Don't miss out on this unique opportunity to own this beautiful property. Contact me today to schedule a viewing.
